Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green & Orange Line Service Delayed in the area of Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green & Orange Line trains continue to stand in the area of Roosevelt due to a report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green & Orange Line trains are standing in the area of Roosevelt due to a report of a minor fire at track level. 

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service. Shuttle buses are available:

  • between Clark/Lake and Halsted for Orange Line Service 

        and,

  • between Indiana and Clark/Lake for Green Line Service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #3 King Drive and #62 Archer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
